title: tilavaiyEnum
sahitya:
tilavaiyEnum kavalaiyillA divya jIvanam sheivOm


anupallavi

  salavaik-kuzhandai pOlavE parAshaktiyiDattil vaittu bhAram


caraNam 1    mAnamAghat-tozhil sheiduNDu mAsilAda manadu koNDu
dAnamAgat-tannit-tandu dharmam sheyyum karmayOgam
    caraNam 2    oppilAda paramporuLAm oruvanai sharaN pughundu kalandE
appar vaLLuvar AzhvAr pOlE nAm AtmAnanda sutantarattil
